## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                    | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------ | --------- | ----------- |
| `attrId`   | `attr-id`  | The unique id of the radio.    | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `checked`  | `checked`  | Whether the radio is checked.  | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Whether the radio is disabled. | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `name`     | `name`     | The name of the radio group.   | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `required` | `required` | Whether the radio is required. | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `value`    | `value`    | The value of the radio.        | `string`  | `undefined` |
